description:
Another day, another Linux drama, this time we find out that Sonny Piers a well beloved member of the GNOME community has as of a few months ago been silently removed from the GNOME Foundation board and banned from GNOME related channels like the Gitlab, GNOME forums, etc. Why, well no one knows.

title: Sonny Piers BANNED From The GNOME Project
